description:
Earn money in many aerial missions and buy new machines or upgrade the ones you already have in your hangar.
Fight with waves of different enemy machines and do not get hit in a bullet hell.
Get the highest score on each mission.
Defeat bosses controlling powerful planes.

Get in your plane and join the air battle!
name: Air Battle
intro: Air Battle is a game in which the player takes control of one of the historical types of aircraft from World War II.
